spec_data.Name: exchange-bmc-os-info
spec_data.Description:
Given a host with BMC, this package would pass the hostname &
OS information to the BMC and also capture the BMC ip info
for the host OS to use.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 12:18:30 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Let OS and BMC exchange info
